title: Is there any need to go beyond news writing to the realm of creative writing in the present scenario? - Quora
tags: Breaking in as a New Author or Novelist

response.answer_text: Thanks for A2A. News Writing is a very different stream and Creative Writing an entirely different stream. You can’t go either way depending upon the ”current scenario.” You need to do whatever feels right to you. If you are into journalistic writing, then go for it and if you are a creative writer then go for that, irrespective of whatever the current scenario.
